text: Walter Kurt Hayman FRS (6 January 1926 - 1 January 2020) was a German-British mathematician. He was known for his works to complex analysis. He was Emeritus Professor at Imperial College London. Hayman was born in Cologne. Hayman died on 1 January 2020 at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:British mathematicians Category:German mathematicians Category:Scientists from Cologne Category:Academics of Imperial College London
title: Walter Hayman
